title: The Seaspiracy “virtually empty ocean” claim
description: Popular Netflix documentary Seaspiracy has sparked a lot of debate recently, including some controversy over some of the claims the documentary makes and the numbers behind them. One of the most striking is that: “if current fishing trends continue we will see virtually empty oceans by the year 2048.” Although overfishing is a global problem, we take a look and find that this scenario is unlikely.
itunes:subtitle: Why it’s unlikely our oceans will be virtually empty by 2048.
